product_name: Patagonia Piton Fleece Pullover - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering comfort and insulation during any activity in the cold, the women's Patagonia Piton Fleece Pullover is made with stretchy Polartec(R) fabric that wicks moisture and dries quickly. Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) fabric provides superior stretch, warmth and moisture management; durable, smooth jersey face slides easily beneath outer layers. Deep front zipper allows for venting when needed. Nylon elastic cuffs and hem seals out wind. Seamless shoulders for pack-wearing comfort. Patagonia Piton Fleece Pullover features a low-bulk, slim fit. Closeout.
short_description: Offering comfort and insulation during any activity in the cold, the women's Patagonia Piton Fleece Pullover is made with stretchy Polartec(R) fabric that wicks moisture and dries quickly.
